title: Suggested buff to protobelt.
body:
So despite the fact that everyone hyped this item up, i've seen it used very ltitle in patch 6.9 so far, and i've been straight up spamming the fuck out of ranked.

Here's my suggestion: Give it 20 more AP in exchange for 400 more gold cost (I am going to coin this buff "the morello treatment"). This will make it a more valuable item for the champions that need to build it most (mages). Right now I feel like, at its gold cost, all it is really good for is like support morgana or support annie, because anything mid really needs stronger items like rabadons, rylais, zhonyas, etc, that all cost more gold but do more.
